This repo is made with the purpose of creating a hex map in the shape of North Carolina state for the **useR2025!** conference.

![](nc-hexwall.png)

Materials used for this project are:

-   This repository uses code from the original [hexwall](https://github.com/mitchelloharawild/hexwall) project.

-   [useR! 2018 feature wall](https://mitchelloharawild.com/blog/user-2018-feature-wall/){.uri} blogpost

-   [{sf} Plotting Simple Features](https://r-spatial.github.io/sf/articles/sf5.html){.uri}
